trans-unit.source: Represents the C14N XML canonicalization transform for a digital signature as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), with comments.
trans-unit.target: Representerar C14N XML-kanonikaliseringstransformering för en digital signatur som definierats av World Wide Web Consortium (W3C), med kommentarer.

trans-unit.source: The XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform class represents the C14N XML canonicalization transform that describes the canonical form of an XML document.
trans-unit.target: Klassen XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform representerar C14N XML-kanonikaliseringstransformering som beskriver den kanoniska formen av ett XML-dokument.

trans-unit.source: This transform allows a signer to create a digest using the canonical form of an XML document.
trans-unit.target: Den här transformeringen kan en undertecknare att skapa en sammanfattad med hjälp av den kanoniska formen av ett XML-dokument.

trans-unit.source: A recipient can then verify the digital signature using the same canonical form of the XML document with the same transform.
trans-unit.target: En mottagare kan sedan verifiera den digitala signaturen med samma kanonisk form av XML-dokument med samma transformeringen.

trans-unit.source: Use the XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform class when you need to sign an XML document that contains comments.
trans-unit.target: Använd klassen XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform när du måste registrera ett XML-dokument som innehåller kommentarer.

trans-unit.source: Note that you cannot directly create a new instance of a canonicalization transform class.
trans-unit.target: Observera att du direkt inte kan skapa en ny instans av en kanonikaliseringen transform-klass.

trans-unit.source: To specify a canonicalization transform, pass the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the transform to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo.CanonicalizationMethod%2A> property, which is accessible from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.SignedInfo%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill ange en kanonikaliseringstransformering skickar den identifierare URI (Uniform Resource) som beskriver transformeringen som ska den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo.CanonicalizationMethod%2A>-egenskap som är tillgänglig från den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.SignedInfo%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.SignedInfo%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo.CanonicalizationMethod%2A>

trans-unit.source: To acquire a reference to the canonicalization transform, use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo.CanonicalizationMethodObject%2A> property, which is accessible from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.SignedInfo%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill hämta en referens till kanonikaliseringstransformering använder den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo.CanonicalizationMethodObject%2A>-egenskap som är tillgänglig från den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.SignedInfo%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.SignedInfo%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo.CanonicalizationMethodObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: The URI that describes the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigExcC14NWithCommentsTransform> class is defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigExcC14NWithCommentsTransformUrl> field.
trans-unit.target: Den URI som beskriver den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigExcC14NWithCommentsTransform>klass definieras av den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigExcC14NWithCommentsTransformUrl>fält.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigExcC14NWithCommentsTransformUrl> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigExcC14NWithCommentsTransform>

trans-unit.source: The URI that describes the XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform class is defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransformUrl> field and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigCanonicalizationWithCommentsUrl> field.
trans-unit.target: Den URI som beskriver XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform klass definieras av den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransformUrl>fält och <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigCanonicalizationWithCommentsUrl>fält.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigCanonicalizationWithCommentsUrl> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransformUrl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the C14N with comments transform, see Sections 6.5 and 6.6.1 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: Mer information om C14N med kommentarer transformera, se avsnitt 6.5 och 6.6.1 i specifikationen XMLDSIG som är tillgängliga från World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) på www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

trans-unit.source: The canonicalization algorithm is defined in the W3C Canonical XML specification, which is available at www.w3.org/TR/xml-c14n.
trans-unit.target: Kanoniseringsalgoritm har definierats i specifikationen W3C kanoniska XML som finns på www.w3.org/TR/xml-c14n.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigC14NWithCommentsTransform"> </xref> klass.
